        "b936bd205ee94a6f84ef9546cffcf9c5": {
          "id": "b936bd205ee94a6f84ef9546cffcf9c5",
          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""

        },
        "d781314e684d42479d1613a3eb7b207e": {
          "id": "d781314e684d42479d1613a3eb7b207e",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Leave Encashment",
          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Leave encashment is your accumulated leave balance available. All permanent employees qualify to encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year."
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Here is how you can go about making your leave encashment request: "
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "bulleted-list",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "type": "list-item",
                    "children": [
                      {
                        "text": "Type ‘Create Request’ in the Workday Search field"
                      }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    "type": "list-item",
                    "children": [
                      {
                        "text": "Select ‘Leave Encashment’ from the list appearing"
                      }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    "type": "list-item",
                    "children": [
                      {
                        "text": "Fill in the questionnaire, ie. number of days"
                      }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    "type": "list-item",
                    "children": [
                      {
                        "text": "Click on Submit"
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Please note that leave encashment successfully submitted on Workday by the payroll cut off date - which is the 10th of every month - is paid in the current month's pay run."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        }
      },
      "edges": [
        {
